item.description:
Everyone is always saying how great it is to be and talk with like-minded folks; so we'll have the entire meetup for doing so!  Each time we've done this it has been thoroughly enjoyable, inspiring, thought provoking and expanding for everyone

Bring whatever is on your mind or whatever you'd love to discuss with other law of attraction thinkers, as long as it's somewhat related toour meetup mission(law of attraction and feeling good!).  We'll mastermind and share group wisdom and resources.

And, if you have something you'd like focused help with, we'll be happy to offer some laser coaching, if you like!

Simple as that, but it's sure to be a rich and satisfying evening, as it always is.

Please remember, if your plans change after you've RSVP'd "yes", be considerate and let us know by changing your RSVP or e-mailing Ann at annide@newpossibilitiescoaching.com.  Most of you have been really good about this lately, and we really appreciate it!  Thank you!

Eagerly looking forward to spending time with you!

Ann and Mark
item.how_to_find_us: We're down a long driveway. Look for white mailbox with our name and #276, across from large, old, white house

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: Masterminding, sharing group wisdom and laser coaching!
